title: How a Scary Incident Led to a Startup Selling Discreet Panic Buttons
sub_head: After being scared one evening, a student wanted to create a device that was easy to use and visually appealing
body:
In the fall of 2015, Rajia Abdelaziz attended an evening event with friends near the campus of undefinedthe University of Massachusetts Lowell. As she was walking back to her car alone, another car pulled up and a bunch of men started yelling at her.
“At first, I kind of rolled my eyes and continued walking, because unfortunately, women experience this all the time,” she says.
